mapper.select: SELECT infectiousID,objectType,patientID,hospID,reportNo,reportType,patientName,patientParent,idCardNo,boy,birthday,age,ageUnit,workplace,linkPhone,belongTo,address,occupation,occupationElse,caseClass, accidentDate,diagnosisDate,diagnosisHour,deathDate,infectiousClass,infectiousName,correctName,cancelCause,reportUnit,doctorPhone,reportDoctor,memo, marital,nation,nationElse,education,venerismHis, registerAddr,touchHis,touchElse,infectRoute,sampleSource,conclusion,checkConfirmDate,hivConfirmDate,checkUnit, convert(varchar(16),fillTime,120) fillTime, workflow,doctorUserID,doctorUsername FROM Infectious WHERE infectiousID = #{infectiousID:INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO Contagion (objectType,patientID,hospID,department,patientName,idNo,boy,age,inDate,hospitalDay,baseDiagnosis1,baseDiagnosis2,baseDiagnosis3,baseDiagnosis4,hospitalInfect1,occurDay1, hospitalInfect2,occurDay2,factor,surgeryName,emergency,surgeryDate,surgeryDoctor,lastTime1,lastTime2,anaesthesia,cut,feature,microbe,time1,time2,time3,drainage,hormone,time4,time5, sample,bAntiDrug,aAntiDrug,pAntiDrug,antiItem,masterDoctor,monitorDoctor,workflow,doctorUserID,doctorUsername) VALUES (#{objectType:INTEGER},#{patientID:INTEGER},#{hospID:VARCHAR},#{department:VARCHAR},#{patientName:VARCHAR},#{idNo:VARCHAR},#{boy:INTEGER},#{age:VARCHAR},#{inDate:VARCHAR},#{hospitalDay:VARCHAR}, #{baseDiagnosis1:VARCHAR},#{baseDiagnosis2:VARCHAR}, #{baseDiagnosis3:VARCHAR},#{baseDiagnosis4:VARCHAR},#{hospitalInfect1:VARCHAR},#{occurDay1:VARCHAR},#{hospitalInfect2:VARCHAR},#{occurDay2:VARCHAR}, #{factor:VARCHAR},#{surgeryName:VARCHAR},#{emergency:INTEGER}, #{surgeryDate:VARCHAR},#{surgeryDoctor:VARCHAR},#{lastTime1:VARCHAR},#{lastTime2:VARCHAR}, #{anaesthesia:INTEGER},#{cut:INTEGER},#{feature:INTEGER},#{microbe:VARCHAR}, #{time1:VARCHAR},#{time2:VARCHAR},#{time3:VARCHAR},#{drainage:VARCHAR},#{hormone:VARCHAR}, #{time4:VARCHAR},#{time5:VARCHAR}, #{sample:VARCHAR},#{bAntiDrug:VARCHAR},#{aAntiDrug:VARCHAR},#{pAntiDrug:VARCHAR}, #{antiItem:INTEGER},#{masterDoctor:VARCHAR},#{monitorDoctor:VARCHAR} , #{workflow:INTEGER} ,#{doctorUserID:INTEGER},#{doctorUsername:VARCHAR})
select @@IDENTITY as contagionID

INSERT INTO Infectious (objectType,patientID,hospID,reportNo,reportType,patientName,patientParent,idCardNo,boy,birthday,age,ageUnit,workplace,linkPhone,belongTo,address,occupation,occupationElse,caseClass, accidentDate,diagnosisDate,diagnosisHour,deathDate,infectiousClass,infectiousName,correctName,cancelCause,reportUnit,doctorPhone,reportDoctor,memo, marital,nation,nationElse,education,venerismHis, registerAddr,touchHis,touchElse,infectRoute,sampleSource,conclusion,checkConfirmDate,hivConfirmDate,checkUnit,workflow,doctorUserID,doctorUsername) VALUES (#{objectType:INTEGER},#{patientID:INTEGER},#{hospID:VARCHAR},#{reportNo:VARCHAR},#{reportType:INTEGER},#{patientName:VARCHAR},#{patientParent:VARCHAR},#{idCardNo:VARCHAR},#{boy:INTEGER},#{birthday:VARCHAR}, #{age:VARCHAR},#{ageUnit:VARCHAR},#{workplace:VARCHAR},#{linkPhone:VARCHAR},#{belongTo:VARCHAR},#{address:VARCHAR},#{occupation:VARCHAR},#{occupationElse:VARCHAR}, #{caseClass:INTEGER}, #{accidentDate:VARCHAR},#{diagnosisDate:VARCHAR},#{diagnosisHour:VARCHAR},#{deathDate:VARCHAR},#{infectiousClass:INTEGER},#{infectiousName:VARCHAR}, #{correctName:VARCHAR},#{cancelCause:VARCHAR},#{reportUnit:VARCHAR},#{doctorPhone:VARCHAR},#{reportDoctor:VARCHAR}, #{memo:VARCHAR}, #{marital:INTEGER},#{nation:INTEGER},#{nationElse:VARCHAR},#{education:VARCHAR},#{venerismHis:VARCHAR},#{registerAddr:VARCHAR},#{touchHis:INTEGER},#{touchElse:VARCHAR},#{infectRoute:VARCHAR}, #{sampleSource:VARCHAR},#{conclusion:VARCHAR},#{checkConfirmDate:VARCHAR},#{hivConfirmDate:VARCHAR},#{checkUnit:VARCHAR}, #{workflow:INTEGER} ,#{doctorUserID:INTEGER} ,#{doctorUsername:VARCHAR} )
select @@IDENTITY as infectiousID
